description:
As Kaoru and Yahiko anxiously await his return, a wounded but determined Kenshin arrives for his final showdown with Shishio, who is unwilling to have anyone stand in his way of controlling Japan`s future.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakumatsu o Kaketa Futari: Shishio tai Kenshin Saishuusen!
Os Sobreviventes do Final da Era Tokugawa
Two Men at the End of an Era
การต่อสู้ครั้งสุดท้ายของชิชิโอะและเคนชิน
幕末を駆けた二人・志々雄 対 剣心 最終戦!
